titleStmt.title: A warning, or, a word of advice to the City of London, and to the whole Kingdome of England, concerning the armies intentions and actions; / by him who is a lover of righteousnesse and peace; and at present a member of the army, very vsefull and considerable.
titleStmt.author: Him who is a lover of righteousnesse and peace.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
